gate.compound

Interface CompoundDocument

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Object>, gate.Document, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.LanguageResource, gate.util.NameBearer, gate.Resource, Serializable, gate.SimpleDocument, gate.TextualDocument
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCompoundDocument, CompoundDocumentFromXml, CompoundDocumentImpl

    public interface CompoundDocument
extends gate.TextualDocument
    Compound document is a collection of individual documents. When it is created, it doesn't contain any composite document but one can create it by using the combine PR.
    Author:
    niraj

        Alignment getAlignmentInformation(String alignmentFeatureName)
